snippet.title: Witchblood Gameplay Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
https://www.meta.com/experiences/7221491444554579/

Witchblood is a stunning, mixed-reality adventure inspired by Metroid® and Castlevania®, explore an intricate diorama brimming with hidden treasures, challenging puzzles, formidable foes, and powerful magic. 

After a zealous madman slays your father, you uncover ancestral magic abilities. Master these newfound powers and take on the oppressive cult dominating your town. Face the murderer of your father to reveal the mysteries of your origin and the power of your birthright. 

With 6+ hours of exploration and combat, hundreds of rooms, 40 upgrades, and 4 difficulty levels to master, Witchblood transforms classic gaming with VR.

Developed and published by:
https://www.hiddenpath.com/
